name: Mars Tycoon
description:
Welcome To Mars!

At -65C below freezing, no oxygen and zero atmosphere, the conditions are hostile for Life...

Despite this, Mars remains our best hope for becoming a multi-planetary species...

In 2025, 6 brave Astronauts will set foot here for the first time - another giant leap for mankind...

Their mission is to prepare for a Human colony on Mars...

Your mission is to ensure their survival...

First find Water and a Power source to synthesize breathable air...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

◈ Build the first human colony on Mars!
◈ Find and synthesize the necessary elements to stay alive!
◈ Grow your colony with new visitors from Earth.
◈ Expand and set up Industry to exploit Mars' natural resources.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Notify me of any suggestions and/or bugs @timtupman.
